definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: To the Strait of Hormuz and the Gulf of Oman and the Arabian Sea converge.
sentences.chinese: 以霍尔木兹海峡和阿曼湾与阿拉伯海衔接。

sentences.english: It flows west from the mountains of Madhya Pradesh to the Gulf of Khambhat and the Arabian Sea.
sentences.chinese: 源于中央邦山区，至西流入坎帕德湾和阿拉伯海。

sentences.english: To the south is the Arabian Sea, with 1,046 km (650 mile) of Pakistani coastline.
sentences.chinese: 在其南方是阿拉伯海，距巴基斯坦海岸1046公里。

sentences.english: A region of western India bordering on the Arabian Sea.
sentences.chinese: 古吉拉特印度西部一地区，与阿拉伯海相邻。

pinyin: Huo4 er3 mu4 zi1 Hai3 xia2
Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2
